text: I've been toying with a Drona deck that runs lots of color changing effects
Dromar
Looks like you've already hit on it, though
Warped devotion is a great include

text: I'm curious, what does having basics have to do with anything?
Has anyone ever built a UB Tezz or UB artifact EDH deck?
You looking to do 1v1 or multi?
I have it built. I just want to make sure I’m not missing any cards. Or overlooking anything.
Who's the commander?
Phenax. All in mindcrank.
Link the list!
Tezz as backup.
Ok. One sec.
Ah, so it's really more of mill deck :wink:
I wrote an article about mindcrank, it just wasn't artifact based
in ub too
I missed that one. Do you have a link?
sure
<http://articles.edhrec.com/combo-corner-the-scarab-god/>
I went deep on mindcrank for a year and a half for modern.
Sweet. I’ll read it during lunch.
I love crank, I ran it in nekusar until my group decided that nekusar can't be around for longer than a turn
<http://www.mtgotraders.com/deck/#/view?deck=1658>
"draw two, take two, mill two"
you're missing a couple of things that could make it go even more all-in than it is now
....but it might make the deck worse overall
What were you thinking?

text: It just sets my MTG brain on fire. I love it.
Henry is just being a old fuddy duddy
I cannot deny the age of the fuddy duddiness
Henry likes to win the old fasioned with, with Lab man
"Back in my day sonny, we had to win with lab man and deadeye navigator and we liked it!"
there is another infinite combo I can think of that would fit into here, however it seems like a pain in the ass to do on MTGO
so I would not be offended if you didn't do it
MTGO is a PITA
I wish mtgo had a function where you can perform a loop and the program would recognize it so you could repeat it without a billion clicks
yuuuup
my favorite thing about mtgo is that they have a hard limit on tokens for players
It would actually consider buying into modern there if they did. They make it almost literally impossible to play Collected Company decks as is
Yea that too.
but yeah, the combo is the junk diver/myr retriever + sac outlet and artifact cost reduction combo
with altar of the brood out already that mills them out, or with something like blasting station you can just hit 'em in the face
That also sounds like a nightmare on mtgo
right?
And by nightmare I mean you just don't get to
that's why i say don't do it
you'd likely just time yourself out
unless you're real fast on the clicks
Fastest fingers in the west or something like that
and that's why my girlfriend is still with me
There we go
I was going to make that joke myself but I wanted to give someone else the chance
We have fun
low hanging fruit are my specialty

text: Seems like there’s better ways to do what it does, though having an emergency elixir of immortality in response to a grave wipe has uses
It has some good versatility in a reanimator deck or if you want some mill outside of blue.
Seems pretty solid to me. I would run it in a few decks. Seems really good in sultai self mill.
Which mode?
Top mode for self mill, bottom mode to protect the yard. Both are relevant in decks like sultai sidisi.
I like having both modes on the same card; however, Sultai itself has better options for both.
I also wish it didn't exile itself. Seems unnecessary.
Agreed, but it is colorless and having a reduced strain in mana requirements is always nice in a 3 color or beyond deck.
I think it's good in a mono-black reanimator deck.
<https://manastack.com/deck/dromar-blink-bounce-repeat>
